Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
com.bbbb.data.Order.OrderService
public class OrderService extends Object
Service class for handling Order related database operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderService(Database database)
    Constructs an OrderService with a database connection.

      Constructs an OrderService with a database connection.

  • Method Details

    • addItemToCurrentOrder

      public void addItemToCurrentOrder(Item item)
      Adds the specified item to the current order.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item to add to the order.

    • removeItemFromCurrentOrder

      public void removeItemFromCurrentOrder(Item item)
      Removes the specified item from the current order.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item to remove from the order.

    • getItemsInCurrentOrder

      public List<Item> getItemsInCurrentOrder()
      Retrieves the list of items in the current order.
      Returns:
      A list of Item objects in the current order.

    • startNewOrder

      public void startNewOrder()
      Starts a new order, initializing a new Order object and setting its order ID.

    • getOrderTotal

      public BigDecimal getOrderTotal()
      Retrieves the total price of the current order.
      Returns:
      The total price of the current order.

    • setCurrentOrderTip

      public void setCurrentOrderTip(BigDecimal tip)
      Sets the tip for the current order.
      Parameters:
      tip - The tip amount to set.

    • getLastNumOrders

      public List<Order> getLastNumOrders(int numOrders)
      Retrieves the last specified number of orders from the database, ordered by date in descending order.
      Parameters:
      numOrders - The number of orders to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Order objects.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an error occurs while retrieving the orders.

    • placeCurrentOrder

      public void placeCurrentOrder(int cashierId, PaymentMethod paymentMethod, LocalDateTime date)
      Places an order to the database. An order will be added to the order table. All items in the order will be added to the order_item table. For each item, all toppings on the item will be added to the order_item_topping table. A new order will be started.
      Parameters:
      cashierId - the id of the cashier placing the order
      paymentMethod - the payment method to be used
      date - the Local date time the order is being placed
